definition: lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
38th parallel/dividing line agreed at Yalta between US and Soviet zones of influence in Korea, now the DMZ between North and South Korea

pinyin: qie2 er4 shi2 ba1 xing1 piao2 chong2

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一個年輕的男人十八歲或二十歲時，要舉行冠禮。

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世紀，芭蕾漸漸地發展成爲了一種舞臺表演。

sentences.english: The powers and functions of the district organizations and the method for their formation shall be prescribed by law.
sentences.chinese: 第九十八條區域組織的職權和組成方法由法律規定。
今天，在九十八個國家運作。

sentences.english: The attacker was identified by the state-run Xinhua news agency as Wu Huanming, 48.
sentences.chinese: 中國新華社確認了該襲擊者名爲吳煥明，四十八歲。

sentences.english: Article 21 A villagers' assembly is composed of villagers at or above the age of 18 in the village.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一條村民會議由本村十八週歲以上的村民組成。

sentences.english: In the late 18th century coal became one of the most sought-after natural resources.
sentences.chinese: 十八世紀末期，煤炭成爲最搶手的自然資源。

sentences.english: He s eighteen now and I believe he can paddle his own canoe.
sentences.chinese: 他已經十八歲了，所以我相信他完全可以自食其力了。

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港幣二十八元。

sentences.english: There are eighteen boys in our class.
sentences.chinese: 我們班有十八個男同學。

sentences.english: So the children of Israel served Eglon the king of Moab eighteen years.
sentences.chinese: 於是以色列人服事摩押王伊磯倫十八年。

sentences.english: In the eighteenth year of the reign of Josiah was this passover kept.
sentences.chinese: 這逾越節是約西亞作王十八年守的。

sentences.english: Each Applicant must be aged 18 years and above.
sentences.chinese: 每一申請人須滿十八週歲及以上。

sentences.english: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏有一個人，病了三十八年。

sentences.english: A capillary GC method was established for determination of cetyl alcohol and stearyl alcohol in cetostearyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 建立了毛細管GC法測定藥用輔料十六十八醇的含量。

sentences.english: The 28th of February, 1815, at half-past two in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 一八一五年二月二十八日，下午兩點半鐘。
